name: Mexicana Tomato and Corn Soup
description: Epicure Taco Seasoning is a great way to add Tex-Mex flavour without the salt! One teaspoon contains only 10 mg of sodium.
preparation: Coat Multipurpose Pot with oil and set over medium heat. Add onion and celery. Saut√© for 5 minutes, until soft.
Add tortilla strips, corn, and Taco Seasoning. Cook, stirring often, for about 3 minutes, until softened. Stir in tomatoes and beef broth. Bring to a boil, then cover and simmer for about 15 minutes.
Add beans and simmer until heated through. Spoon into bowls and serve.

products.name: Taco Seasoning (Jar)
summary: Classic Tex-Mex flavor with medium heat.
